meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Emily Wood Nina Emkin Bill Tolany Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6693.

td.p: Emily Wood, an attorney from Waltham, Massachusetts
Nina Emkin, a tutor from Los Angeles, California
Bill Tolany, a marketing executive from Austin, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,500)

tr.td: GAMBLING
AT THE TRACK
SPORTS BOOK
(Alex: You have to identify the sports.)
PARLEZ?
(Alex: You have to translate the French word.)
ALL IN

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Bill
Nina
Emily

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Bill
Nina
Emily
FARTHER LEFT THAN BARACK OBAMA
(Alex: We'll show you pictures. You have to identify the person, as you look at the photo, to the left of President Obama.)
CLASSICAL LITERATURE
SEVEN UP
WOMEN DIRECTORS
ANIMAL VERBS
POINT "A" TO POINT "B"
(Alex: Two places in each correct response--the first one begins with the letter "A", the second one with a "B".)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_2', 'clue_DJ_6_2_stuck', '(Alex: Bill? Hurry.)
(Bill: What are... Annapolis &... Bennapolis?)
(Alex: No.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: What are [*]?)
(Bill: I\'m from Austin, by the way.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: Oh. Your folks back home will not let you live down this moment.)

Austin & Boston

Bill
')

$5,700
an atom')

Bill
Nina
Emily

Nina
Emily

28 R
(including 1 DD),
4 W
(including 2 DDs)

8 R,
3 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
